title: Pbe For OCe
body: It would be awesome if riot set up a pbe for us there is a NA one i used to be there and level 30 but then i moved to oce and i find it unfair that only they get the rights to it Plz RITO <3 {{champion:32}}

replies.body: they just need to let oce players participate in the na one :(

No because it's not effective. We already have very low population of players in OCE. They don't even release TT fully or Dominion at all because of server costs relative to the number of players that would actually play these modes. 
They removed Draft Normals Pick because they said it was a waste of resources to keep it up; not enough players were playing at any given time.
